DOC.brief_summary: This pilot randomize control trial ass effect advance supply emergency contraception versus routine care teen postpartum population . The goal assess feasibility recruit retain postpartum teen ; obtain estimate prevalence ( use Plan B , primary contraceptive continuation , unprotected intercourse exposure , pregnancy rate ) , postpartum teen give advance supply Plan B ; ass whether ( lack use Plan B , contraceptive method non-continuation , unprotected intercourse exposure ) , surrogate marker risk unintended pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Advance Supply Emergency Contraception Compared Routine Postpartum Care Teens
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female 2 . English speak 3 . Aged 1419 enrollment 4 . Immediately postpartum live infant 5 . Planning parent baby 6 . Desiring delay another pregnancy least one year 7 . General good health 8 . Willing able follow study protocol Exclusion Criteria 1 . Allergy levonorgestrel 2 . Current substance abuse 3 . Plans relocation outside Philadelphia
